original: bsags la dmigs pa'i rnam pa yin //
analyzed: bsags la dmigs pa'i rnam pa yin //
translated: have the aspect of observing the aggregates.

original: sems dang sems byung dmigs pa ni //
analyzed: sems dang sems byung dmigs pa ni //
translated: The mental faculty and the mental activities

original: drug par gzhag par byas pa yin //
analyzed: drug par gzhag par byas pa yin //
translated: are said to be the sixth.

original: dbang po gzugs can la brten pa rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga'i yul ni rdul phra rab du ma 'dus pa yin pas /
analyzed: dbang po gzugs can la brten pa rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga'i yul ni rdul phra rab du ma 'dus pa yin pas /
translated: The five material sense faculties are the support of the five consciousnesses. The object of the five consciousnesses is a composite of many subtle atoms.

original: rnam pa de snyed kyi rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir sna tshogs nyid las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de snyed kyi rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir sna tshogs nyid las mi 'da'o //
translated: Since the consciousnesses are associated with that many aspects, they do not transcend the state of being various.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang de dang don mthun te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang de dang don mthun te /
translated: Mental consciousness is similar to those.

original: de dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa'o //
translated: It is the same in substance and happiness.

original: chos kyi khams rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyang mi rigs pa'i phyir tshor ba la sogs pa phung po gsum tsam gyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: chos kyi khams rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyang mi rigs pa'i phyir tshor ba la sogs pa phung po gsum tsam gyi bdag nyid de /
translated: The nature of the three aggregates of feeling and so on is the nonindicative form of the element of mental objects and unconditioned states because it is illogical that they are the object of the five consciousnesses.

original: de la dmigs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang sems las byung ba 'ba' zhig la mi 'dzin gyi /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang sems las byung ba 'ba' zhig la mi 'dzin gyi /
translated: Mental consciousness that focuses on that also does not apprehend only mental factors alone.

original: sems dang sems las @63b byung ba'i tshogs la dmigs te /
analyzed: sems dang sems las @63b byung ba'i tshogs la dmigs te /
translated: It focuses on the collection of mind and mental factors.

original: de'i grangs snyed kyi rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sna tshogs nyid las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: de'i grangs snyed kyi rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sna tshogs nyid las mi 'da'o //
translated: Because it possesses the aspects of that many, it does not transcend being a diversity.

original: gang dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab legs par gsungs pa 'di las phyi rol du gnas pa gzegs zan dang ser skya la sogs pa'i lugs la 'chel la /
analyzed: gang dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab legs par gsungs pa 'di las phyi rol du gnas pa gzegs zan dang ser skya la sogs pa'i lugs la 'chel la /
translated: Those who stand outside this well-spoken teaching of the Sugata, who are attached to the systems of Kanada, Kapila, and so on,

original: 'bras bu'i rdzas la sogs pa don gcig gi yul shes par smra ba de dag gi lugs ltar na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rdzas la sogs pa don gcig gi yul shes par smra ba de dag gi lugs ltar na /
translated: and who say that consciousness cognizes a single object such as a substance that is an effect, according to their systems,

original: don gcig pu de'i rnam par shes pa gcig pu'i bdag nyid du 'gal ba med do zhe na /
analyzed: don gcig pu de'i rnam par shes pa gcig pu'i bdag nyid du 'gal ba med do zhe na /
translated: it is not contradictory for consciousness to be of the nature of a single entity that is a single object.

original: mi rung ste 'di ltar /🔽phyi gzhung rnams la'ang rnam shes ni //
analyzed: mi rung ste 'di ltar / phyi gzhung rnams la'ang rnam shes ni //
translated: This is not correct.🔽In the non-Buddhist systems,

original: gcig tu snang bar mi rigs te //🔽yon tan la sogs ldan pa yis /
analyzed: gcig tu snang bar mi rigs te // yon tan la sogs ldan pa yis /
translated: it is not logical for consciousness to appear as one,

original: rdzas la sogs pa dmigs phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas la sogs pa dmigs phyir ro //
translated: because substances and so on that possess qualities and so on are observed.

original: de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa yon tan rnams dang / bskyod pa la sogs pa las rnams dang / lag pa la sogs pa rang gi yan lag rnams dang / spyi la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i lus la sogs pa'i rdzas la dmigs so zhes smra ste /
analyzed: de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa yon tan rnams dang / bskyod pa la sogs pa las rnams dang / lag pa la sogs pa rang gi yan lag rnams dang / spyi la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i lus la sogs pa'i rdzas la dmigs so zhes smra ste /
translated: They say that consciousnesses observe substances such as the body, which possess qualities such as form, actions such as moving, and parts such as the hands.

original: yon tan la sogs pa yang rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan no zhe'o //
analyzed: yon tan la sogs pa yang rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan no zhe'o //
translated: They also say that qualities and so forth possess substances and so forth.

original: de dag gi lugs ltar na yang rnam par shes pa la don du ma snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: de dag gi lugs ltar na yang rnam par shes pa la don du ma snang ba nyid do //
translated: According to their systems, many objects appear to consciousness.

original: rgyal ba pa dang / rgyal dpog pa rnams kyi ltar na yang /
analyzed: rgyal ba pa dang / rgyal dpog pa rnams kyi ltar na yang /
translated: According to the Jaina and the Lokayata,

original: nor bu gzi yi bdag nyid ltar //
analyzed: nor bu gzi yi bdag nyid ltar //
translated: like a jewel with many facets,

original: dngos po kun shes lta ba la //
analyzed: dngos po kun shes lta ba la //
translated: all things appear to the view.

original: de la 'dzin pa'i sems kyang ni /
analyzed: de la 'dzin pa'i sems kyang ni /
translated: The mind that apprehends them

original: gcig pu'i ngo bor snang mi rigs //
analyzed: gcig pu'i ngo bor snang mi rigs //
translated: cannot appear as a single entity.

original: de dag smra ba ni /
analyzed: de dag smra ba ni /
translated: Their assertion is this:

original: du ma'i ngo bo'i dngos po la //
analyzed: du ma'i ngo bo'i dngos po la //
translated: In a thing that has many aspects,

original: brjod par 'dod pa ngo bor 'dod //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa ngo bor 'dod //
translated: the aspect that is the object of expression is asserted.🔽There are two ways of expressing this:

original: cig ca 'am rim gyis tshul gnyis las //
analyzed: cig ca 'am rim gyis tshul gnyis las //
translated: simultaneously and gradually.

original: tshig gi bya ba gzhan med do //
analyzed: tshig gi bya ba gzhan med do //
translated: There is no other way of expressing it.

original: dper na khra bo'i kha dog las //
analyzed: dper na khra bo'i kha dog las //
translated: For example, like a variegated color,

original: ji ltar 'dod bzhin kha dog 'dzin //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod bzhin kha dog 'dzin //
translated: it takes on the color as desired.

original: de bzhin dngos la sna tshogs phyir //
analyzed: de bzhin dngos la sna tshogs phyir //
translated: In the same way, because of the variety of things,

original: tha dad tha dad min par rtog / ces zer ro //
analyzed: tha dad tha dad min par rtog / ces zer ro //
translated: it is conceived as different and not different.

original: yul sna tshogs la rnam par shes pa sna tshogs ma yin pa snang ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: yul sna tshogs la rnam par shes pa sna tshogs ma yin pa snang ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable that a variety of consciousnesses do not appear in regard to a variety of objects,

original: de dag dang mthun par mi 'jug pas mi 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag dang mthun par mi 'jug pas mi 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not engage in accordance with them, it does not apprehend them.🔽To the followers of the view of the teacher of the gods,

original: lha'i bla ma'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la smras pa /🔽sa la sogs pa 'dus pa la //
analyzed: lha'i bla ma'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la smras pa / sa la sogs pa 'dus pa la //
translated: it is said:🔽In the collection of earth and so on,

original: yul dang dbang por kun 'jog par //
analyzed: yul dang dbang por kun 'jog par //
translated: the object and the sense faculty are posited.

original: su 'dod de yi lugs la yang //
analyzed: su 'dod de yi lugs la yang //
translated: In that system, too,

original: dngos po gcig dang mthun 'jug med //🔽'dus par rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu ni 'dus pa can du ma yin pas 'dus pa la 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni gcig dang mthun par 'jug par mi rigs so //
analyzed: dngos po gcig dang mthun 'jug med // 'dus par rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu ni 'dus pa can du ma yin pas 'dus pa la 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni gcig dang mthun par 'jug par mi rigs so //
translated: there is no engagement in accordance with a single thing.

original: ser @64a * //
analyzed: ser @64a * //
translated: Since the cause of the positing of the collection is not the many that are collected, it is not reasonable that the consciousness that apprehends the collection engages in accordance with a single thing.

original: skya'i dbang du byas nas smras pa /
analyzed: skya'i dbang du byas nas smras pa /
translated: To the followers of Kapila, it is said:

original: snying stobs la sogs bdag sgra sogs //
analyzed: snying stobs la sogs bdag sgra sogs //
translated: Sattva and so on are the self, sound and so on,

original: phyogs la'ang don gcig snang ba can //
analyzed: phyogs la'ang don gcig snang ba can //
translated: And even if it were, it would be impossible for a single thing to appear as many.

original: shes pa rigs pa ma yin te //
analyzed: shes pa rigs pa ma yin te //
translated: It is not reasonable that consciousness is of the nature of the three.

original: gsum gyi bdag nyid yul snang phyir //
analyzed: gsum gyi bdag nyid yul snang phyir //
translated: Because the object appears as the nature of the three.

original: ci ste gsum gyi bdag nyid kho nar yul snang ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ci ste gsum gyi bdag nyid kho nar yul snang ba ma yin gyi /
translated: If you say that the object does not appear as the nature of the three,

original: snying stobs la sogs pa gang gi shas che ba de dmigs te gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: snying stobs la sogs pa gang gi shas che ba de dmigs te gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but that the object is observed as the predominance of sattva and so on, and not as the other two,

original: de yang de ltar mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang de ltar mi rung ste /
translated: that is also unreasonable.

original: rigs dang bsgoms pa'i bye brag gis sgra la sogs pa cig kho na la mang po dag gi gdung ba dang zhum pa dang rga ba la sogs pa myong ngo //
analyzed: rigs dang bsgoms pa'i bye brag gis sgra la sogs pa cig kho na la mang po dag gi gdung ba dang zhum pa dang rga ba la sogs pa myong ngo //
translated: Because the specific differences of the elements and meditation are experienced in a single sound and so on, such as the trembling, trembling of many, and aging.

original: yon tan gnyis kyi shas chung na myong ba 'di ji ltar mngon sum du rab tu 'grub /
analyzed: yon tan gnyis kyi shas chung na myong ba 'di ji ltar mngon sum du rab tu 'grub /
translated: If the two qualities are weak, how is this experience established as direct perception?

original: mi snang ba la sogs pa'i dbang gis lhag ma'i ngo bo mi mthong bar 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: mi snang ba la sogs pa'i dbang gis lhag ma'i ngo bo mi mthong bar 'dod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the nature of the remainder is not seen due to the power of invisibility and so on,

original: 'di yang shin tu mi rigs par brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di yang shin tu mi rigs par brjod pa /
translated: this is also said to be completely unreasonable.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo rnam gsum la //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo rnam gsum la //
translated: Because the nature of things is threefold.

original: de ni gal te rnam gcig ste //
analyzed: de ni gal te rnam gcig ste //
translated: If it is one,

original: de dang mi mthun snang na go / de ni de 'dzin ji ltar 'dod ;
analyzed: de dang mi mthun snang na go / de ni de 'dzin ji ltar 'dod ;
translated: If it does not appear in accordance with that, it is not a valid cognition.

original: / yul ji ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin dang mthun par 'jug na rnam par shes pa dmigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur gyi gzhan du na don gzhan bzhin du yul du 'dod pa yang yul du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: / yul ji ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin dang mthun par 'jug na rnam par shes pa dmigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur gyi gzhan du na don gzhan bzhin du yul du 'dod pa yang yul du mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it engages in accordance with the nature of the object as it abides, consciousness becomes the apprehender of the object. Otherwise, like a different object, even if it is asserted to be the object, it is not the object.

original: sgra la sogs pa ni gsum gyi rang bzhin yin la rnam par shes pa ni gcig gi ngo bo dang mthun par 'jug ste de dang mthun par mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa ni gsum gyi rang bzhin yin la rnam par shes pa ni gcig gi ngo bo dang mthun par 'jug ste de dang mthun par mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Sound and so on have the nature of the three, but consciousness engages in accordance with the nature of one. It does not engage in accordance with that.🔽The Vedāntins say:

original: gsang ba pa gang dag / phyi rol yul rnams med par yang //
analyzed: gsang ba pa gang dag / phyi rol yul rnams med par yang //
translated: Even without external objects,

original: sna tshogs snang la rtag pa ste //🔽cig ca'am ji ste rim 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: sna tshogs snang la rtag pa ste // cig ca'am ji ste rim 'byung ba'i //
translated: the various appearances are permanent.🔽It is very difficult to posit

original: rnam shes rung ba shin tu dka' //
analyzed: rnam shes rung ba shin tu dka' //
translated: a consciousness that is momentary or that arises in sequence.

original: ci skad brjod pa de dag gi phyogs la yang sna tshogs su sla ba nyid de /
analyzed: ci skad brjod pa de dag gi phyogs la yang sna tshogs su sla ba nyid de /
translated: In the position of those who say this, the various appearances are easy.

original: 'di ltar sngon po dang ser po'i rnam pa du ma cig car snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa du ma dag dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa de'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du du mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon po dang ser po'i rnam pa du ma cig car snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa du ma dag dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa de'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du du mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, consciousness to which many aspects such as blue and yellow appear simultaneously is not different from many aspects, and therefore, like the nature of those aspects, it is multiple.

original: rim pa yang gzugs dang sgra la sogs par snang ba ni gtan tshigs dang dpe gnyis po 'di dag nyid kyis du mar 'gyur ba las mi 'da' ba nyid do //
analyzed: rim pa yang gzugs dang sgra la sogs par snang ba ni gtan tshigs dang dpe gnyis po 'di dag nyid kyis du mar 'gyur ba las mi 'da' ba nyid do //
translated: The same reasoning and example show that the appearance of form, sound, and so on is not beyond being multiple.

original: gzhan du na 'di gnyis gcig tu ji ltar brjod de nyes pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'di gnyis gcig tu ji ltar brjod de nyes pa snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Otherwise, how could these two be said to be the same? The error is the same as before.

original: rim gyi phyogs la nyes pa gzhan 'di yang yod de /
analyzed: rim gyi phyogs la nyes pa gzhan 'di yang yod de /
translated: There is another error in the position that consciousness arises sequentially.

original: rnam pa gcig rig par 'dod pa na de dang rnam par shes pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de'i rang gi ngo bo lta bu'am /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig rig par 'dod pa na de dang rnam par shes pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de'i rang gi ngo bo lta bu'am /
translated: If you assert that a single aspect is cognized, then because it is not different from consciousness, like the nature of that consciousness, the aspect is also cognized as a single entity.

original: 'dod pa'i rnam pa @64b lta bur snga ma dang phyi ma'i rnam pa yang rig par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rnam pa @64b lta bur snga ma dang phyi ma'i rnam pa yang rig par 'gyur te /
translated: Or, like the aspect that is asserted, the prior and subsequent aspects are also cognized as a single entity.

original: de gnyis kyang 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis kyang 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both of those exist.

original: nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pas 'gog pa la sogs pa gang dag kun rdzob tu yod par brjod pa de dag 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni sna tshogs su snang ba ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pas 'gog pa la sogs pa gang dag kun rdzob tu yod par brjod pa de dag 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni sna tshogs su snang ba ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the consciousnesses that apprehend space, analytical cessations, and so forth, which are said to exist conventionally, do not appear as a variety,

original: de ltar yang ma yin par brjod pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin par brjod pa /
translated: we respond that that is not so.🔽The consciousnesses of space and so forth

original: nam mkha' la sogs shes pa dag / ming tsam du ni snang ba rnams //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs shes pa dag / ming tsam du ni snang ba rnams //
translated: appear as mere names.

original: yi ge du ma snang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: yi ge du ma snang ba'i phyir //
translated: Because they appear as multiple letters,

original: sna tshogs snang bar gsal ba yin //
analyzed: sna tshogs snang bar gsal ba yin //
translated: they are clearly a variety.

original: ming dang 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ma gtogs par de la cha med pa'i ngo bo phra rab tsam gang yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ming dang 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ma gtogs par de la cha med pa'i ngo bo phra rab tsam gang yang mi dmigs so //
translated: Apart from the reflection that is a conception related to a name, we do not observe any entity that is partless and subtle.

original: khas blangs de yang brjod par bya'o //🔽rnam shes sna tshogs min snang ba //
analyzed: khas blangs de yang brjod par bya'o // rnam shes sna tshogs min snang ba //
translated: We must also respond to that assertion.🔽If a consciousness that is not a variety

original: 'ga' zhig yod par bzhugs na yang //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig yod par bzhugs na yang //
translated: of appearances exists,

original: 'on kyang yang dag gzhag mi rung //
analyzed: 'on kyang yang dag gzhag mi rung //
translated: it is still not properly posited,

original: mtshan nyid bcas la gnod mthong phyir //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bcas la gnod mthong phyir //
translated: because it is seen to contradict the characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la ni gnod pa dmigs te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la ni gnod pa dmigs te /
translated: But if it is endowed with characteristics, then a fault is seen,

original: de'i mtshan nyid sun phyung ba'i phyir thams cad du dbugs mi phyin to //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid sun phyung ba'i phyir thams cad du dbugs mi phyin to //
translated: because its characteristics are refuted, there is no relief anywhere.

original: de ltar thams cad kyi phyogs rnams la yang /🔽de'i phyir sna tshogs snang ba yi //🔽rnam shes rnam pa kun tu gnas //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad kyi phyogs rnams la yang / de'i phyir sna tshogs snang ba yi // rnam shes rnam pa kun tu gnas //
translated: Thus, in all the positions,🔽therefore, consciousness appears as various🔽aspects in every way.

original: de ni rnam pa tha dad ltar //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa tha dad ltar //
translated: But just as it has different aspects,

original: gcig pu'i rang bzhin mi rigs so //
analyzed: gcig pu'i rang bzhin mi rigs so //
translated: it is not reasonable that it has a single nature.

original: skabs kyi mjug sdud do //
analyzed: skabs kyi mjug sdud do //
translated: This concludes the section.

original: yang 'dir gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang 'dir gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said here:

original: sor mo tshigs rnams las gzhan min ;
analyzed: sor mo tshigs rnams las gzhan min ;
translated: The finger is not different from its joints,

original: / gzhan ma yin pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: / gzhan ma yin pa yod ma yin //
translated: and it is not non-different.

original: de ltar ma grub tshigs sogs med //
analyzed: de ltar ma grub tshigs sogs med //
translated: Thus, without being established, the joints and so forth do not exist.

original: de phyir tshogs pa tsam yang med //
analyzed: de phyir tshogs pa tsam yang med //
translated: Therefore, even the mere collection does not exist.🔽The finger and so forth,

original: tshogs pa dang ni bcas pa yi //🔽sor mo la sogs rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: tshogs pa dang ni bcas pa yi // sor mo la sogs rnams kyis ni //
translated: together with the collection,

original: dngos po thams cad med par bstan //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad med par bstan //
translated: have been shown to be nonexistent.

original: tshogs ma gtogs pa'i dngos phra med //
analyzed: tshogs ma gtogs pa'i dngos phra med //
translated: There is no subtle entity apart from the collection.

original: de ltar don gcig shes byed pa //
analyzed: de ltar don gcig shes byed pa //
translated: Thus, the cognition of a single object

original: blo ni gang du brtag par bya //
analyzed: blo ni gang du brtag par bya //
translated: should be examined in every case.

original: sems byung tshogs dang bcas sems kyi //
analyzed: sems byung tshogs dang bcas sems kyi //
translated: How could the mind and mental factors

original: dmigs pa gcig 'dir ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: dmigs pa gcig 'dir ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: Have a single focal object?

original: rang gi sde pa sems tsam gyi tshul la brten pa blo gros dkar pa gang dag rnam par shes pa ni mthun pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa la rag las nas 'byung ste /
analyzed: rang gi sde pa sems tsam gyi tshul la brten pa blo gros dkar pa gang dag rnam par shes pa ni mthun pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa la rag las nas 'byung ste /
translated: Some who are of our own Buddhist tradition, who are of pure intellect and who rely on the Cittamātra standpoint, say that consciousness arises in dependence on the ripening of concordant latent propensities.🔽They say that as soon as it arises, it ceases and that it lacks the features of an object, an experiencer, and an experience.

original: byung ma thag tu 'jig pa dang don du tshor bar bya ba dang tshor ba po'i rnam pa med do zhes smra ba de dag gi lugs la dogs pa bsu ste /🔽ji ste thog ma med rgyud kyi //
analyzed: byung ma thag tu 'jig pa dang don du tshor bar bya ba dang tshor ba po'i rnam pa med do zhes smra ba de dag gi lugs la dogs pa bsu ste / ji ste thog ma med rgyud kyi //
translated: The following is a response to their standpoint.🔽The features of emanations

original: bag chags smin pas sprul pa yi //🔽rnam pa dag ni snang ba yang //
analyzed: bag chags smin pas sprul pa yi // rnam pa dag ni snang ba yang //
translated: Appear due to the ripening of beginningless latent propensities.

original: nor bas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra //
analyzed: nor bas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra //
translated: They are like illusions, which are deceptive.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched @65a * //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched @65a * //
translated: The sense sources of form and so on

original: kyi rdul phra rab rnams dang rdzas dang yon tan la sogs pa mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis brjod pa dag mi rigs pa dang tshor bar bya ba dang tshor ba po'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'i phyir dri za'i
analyzed: kyi rdul phra rab rnams dang rdzas dang yon tan la sogs pa mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis brjod pa dag mi rigs pa dang tshor bar bya ba dang tshor ba po'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'i phyir dri za'i
translated: The assertions of the Vaibhāṣikas, who follow the view that the most supreme is the subtle particle and the substance and quality, and so on, are illogical.

original: grong khyer dang / mgal me'i 'khor lo dang / sprul pa dang / rmi lam dang / sgyu ma dang / chu zla lta bu kho na ste /
analyzed: grong khyer dang / mgal me'i 'khor lo dang / sprul pa dang / rmi lam dang / sgyu ma dang / chu zla lta bu kho na ste /

original: dmigs pa bden par 'dod pa'i shes pa la snang ba'i rnam pa 'di dag kyang thog ma med pa'i srid par 'byung ba can dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa'i mthus snang ngo //
analyzed: dmigs pa bden par 'dod pa'i shes pa la snang ba'i rnam pa 'di dag kyang thog ma med pa'i srid par 'byung ba can dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa'i mthus snang ngo //
translated: These aspects that appear to consciousness, which is asserted to be a real object, arise due to the power of the ripening of the latent propensities of the conception of things that has existed since beginningless time.

original: de dag 'on kyang de dag gi /
analyzed: de dag 'on kyang de dag gi /
translated: But do they

analyzed: dngos de yang dag nyid dam ci // 'on te ma brtags gcig pu na //
translated: have a real entity?🔽Or is it that they are accepted

analyzed: dga' bar khas len 'di bsam mo //
translated: as delightful only when not examined?

original: lugs 'di ni tshad ma dang lung shin tu gsal bas shes par bya ba dang / dmigs pa can mtha' yas pa dag gi mngon par zhen pa ngan pa'i gnyen po yang yin pas shin tu dkar ba ste 'di ltar rdul phra rab la sogs pa yod pa dag dgag par byed pa dang tshor bar bya ba dang tshor ba po'i mtshan nyid dang
analyzed: lugs 'di ni tshad ma dang lung shin tu gsal bas shes par bya ba dang / dmigs pa can mtha' yas pa dag gi mngon par zhen pa ngan pa'i gnyen po yang yin pas shin tu dkar ba ste 'di ltar rdul phra rab la sogs pa yod pa dag dgag par byed pa dang tshor bar bya ba dang tshor ba po'i mtshan nyid dang
translated: Therefore, it is very pure. In this way, it refutes the existence of subtle particles and so on, and it also teaches the contradiction of the characteristics of the object of experience and the experiencer.

original: 'gal ba yang ston pa sngar bshad pa'i tshad ma ni tshul 'di rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba yang ston pa sngar bshad pa'i tshad ma ni tshul 'di rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //

original: tshul 'di ni lung dang ldan pa yang yin te /
analyzed: tshul 'di ni lung dang ldan pa yang yin te /

original: lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las thog ma med pa'i blos bsgos pas //
analyzed: lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las thog ma med pa'i blos bsgos pas //
translated: The Descent into Laṅkā Sūtra says:
